Please do not post the same question in multiple places it creates a lot of noise for people trying to answer the questions.
For future readers, the corresponding forum post with the answer is here.

body:
Please do not post the same question in multiple places it creates a lot of noise for people trying to answer the questions.
For future readers, the corresponding forum post with the answer is [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/autograd-isnt-functioning-when-networkss-parameters-are-taken-from-other-networks/27424).
